name: 2D Simple Bowling
description:
A simple but entertaining bowling game. Will you get the highest score?

Each level presents a new challenge to get all the pins to fall within the scoring area.

Aim well in the right direction before throwing the ball. But be careful, there is a time limit to launch!

Project carried out for the "Engines" module of the specialization course in Video Game Development and Virtual Reality of the I.E.S. "Pedro Mercedes", course 2021/2022.

Cuenca (Spain), April 2022.
